Tucson listens to Wheelie and clears his throat with a bit of a commanding =
voice. 

" I understand you're not accustomed to things here, wheelie but m=
ay I remind you that Respect of all your comrades is extremely essential.  =
Please, try to be a little more mindful of what you say.  Rat Trap risked h=
is spark to save mine when it seemed that I was near termination.  And anyo=
ne who does so, deserves respect." 

Tucson Prime states with a stern yet k=
nowledgable expression on his face.

Perpetually on the move and constantly=
 busy.
